verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In view of the extraordinary
nature of these revelations,
to stop me from getting too proud
I was given a thorn in the flesh,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
an angel of Satan to beat me and stop me
from getting too proud!
About this thing,
I have pleaded with the Lord three times
for it to leave me,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
but he has said,
‘My grace is enough for you:
my power is at its best in weakness.’

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So I shall be very happy
to make my weaknesses my special boast
so that the power of Christ may stay over me,
and that is why I am quite content with my weaknesses,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
and with insults, hardships, persecutions,
and the agonies I go through for Christ’s sake.
For it is when I am weak that I am strong.
